Our diverse client roster includes carmakers, science labs, elite sports teams, UX design agencies, and many more. Our audience is fascinating, and our growth potential is huge!
 



  





**You will be the driver of / responsible for:** 



* Team lead for Payroll Partner
* Supervising payroll coordination in our EMEA entities and being a back up
* Global salary review process (budget, system, trainings, data)
* Payroll cost & data analyses
* Salary benchmarking, pay gap analysis, salary data surveys
* Assistance with annual audit and annual report (payroll related)
* Supporting organization with various data and reports
* Implementing any updates/new law regulations in payroll & Comp & Ben areas
* Short- and long-term incentives (process, structure, payments, communication)
* Pension plans, health insurances and other law regulated benefits
* Administration of benefits in various European countries
* Developing & refining processes
* Being involved in various projects (ex M&A, new system implementation, recruitment / termination of employees)



  





**To succeed in this role, we would love you to have:** 



* 5+ years solid experience in EMEA total compensation
* Proven experience in benefits administration
* Experience in Accounting (payroll related costs, STIs)
* Fluent communication skills in English & Swedish, both written and verbal
* Excellent skills in using Excel
* A bachelor's or university degree



  





 To be successful in this role, we believe you are passionate about Comp & Ben and are proud of your expertise. We also believe you are a people person and have worked with various stakeholders preferably in a global or matrix environment.
 



  





 We are a small team working tight together and assisting the group when it's needed. Tobiians characterize a bunch of people with a diverse background, so we hope you enjoy working with people from all over the world!
 



  





**Welcome to apply and help us keep our team happy, motivated, and rewarded!** 




 So let us know about your background, experiences and where you’re heading. Please submit your CV/ resume or LinkedIn profile through our career website.

title: Principal Engineer
company_industry: Software Development, Computer and Network Security, and Information Technology & Services
description:
Flexera saves customers billions of dollars in wasted technology spend. A pioneer in Hybrid ITAM and FinOps, Flexera provides award-winning, data-oriented SaaS solutions for technology value optimization (TVO), enabling IT, finance, procurement and cloud teams to gain deep insights into cost optimization, compliance and risks for each business service. Flexera One solutions are built on a set of definitive customer, supplier and industry data, powered by our Technology Intelligence Platform, that enables organizations to visualize their Enterprise Technology Blueprint™ in hybrid environments—from on-premises to SaaS to containers to cloud.
   

  

 We’re transforming the software industry.  We’re Flexera.  With
 **more than 50,000 customers** 
 across the world, we’re achieving that goal. But we know we can’t do any of that without our team. Ready to help us re-imagine the industry during a time of substantial growth and ambitious plans?  Come and see why
 **we’re consistently recognized by Gartner, Forrester and IDC** 
 as a category leader in the marketplace. Learn more at
 **flexera.com**
**Principal Software Engineer**
 As a Principal Software Engineer at Flexera, you will play a crucial role in setting the technical direction and architecture for our cutting-edge SaaS Management product.
   

  

 Your work will span the entire spectrum of activities required to run a high-performance cloud solution, guiding multiple teams and partner with engineers to develop innovative solutions to complex issues. You will promote best practices across the team and will act as quality expert ensuring our solutions are scalable, secure, and performant. As part of the architecture council, you will help evolve and implement the architectural direction and strategies within Flexera and be a key player that will allow us to deliver on our functional and non-functional requirements for years to come.
   

  

 While much of our work is done remotely, we value the ability to connect face-to-face for high value collaboration activities. As such, our ideal candidate will be based in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

**What You'll Do:** 
  

  

* Actively participate in an agile software development life cycle, including decomposing requirements, documenting and discussing the design, estimation, and implementation.
* Design and implement cloud-based, multi-layered software applications with a strong focus on scalability, performance, and security. Lead the technical roadmap for the SaaS Manager product line.
* Prototype new solutions, contribute to code reviews and analysis of issues, primarily in Go in Kubernetes in Azure.
* Collaborate with Chief Architect, Principal and Lead engineers, and product management to develop technology strategy and architecture for current and future products
* Lead and participate in architecture discussions, generating recommendations that align with the business goals and technology strategy.
* Engage in rapid prototyping and pair programming to validate concepts and refine solutions.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, UX designers and Cloud Operations, to translate requirements into scalable solutions.
* Constantly improve product quality, security, and performance by leveraging the latest deployment and monitoring tools such as ArgoCD, SumoLogic, SonarQube, PagerDuty
* Provide mentorship and technical leadership to the engineering team, fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation.
* Collaborate with teams to create and review architecture and design proposals including functional and non-functional requirements.


**You'll Be Expected to Have:** 
  

  

* Extensive experience in developing complex, cloud-based applications, and can show us your personal/work projects. - Extensive experience with a functional or object-oriented language (Go, C#, Java)
* Ability to reason about software, algorithms, and performance from a high level
* Experience designing and delivering cloud native, microservices based applications and cloud-native solutions, including experience with Kubernetes, Docker, and Terraform.
* Strong proficiency in storage technologies, including MongoDB, Cloud Object storage and RDBMS.
* Superb communication skills to work effectively within and across teams, including mentoring and guiding junior engineers.
* Experience with following is a plus: JavaScript, React, stream processing, AWS
* Experience providing technical leadership across one or more teams
* Strong understanding of agile ways of working and systems thinking


 Sounds good? Join us and collaborate with very talented and passionate colleagues to push the boundaries of cloud computing. Feel free to include examples of your work or your GitHub profile.
   

  

**#Development**
 Flexera is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.  Qualified applicants will be considered for open roles regardless of age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by local/national laws, policies and/or regulations.
   

  

 Flexera understands the value that results from employing a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workforce. We recognize that equity necessitates acknowledging past exclusion and that inclusion requires intentional effort. Our DEI (Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion) council is the driving force behind our commitment to championing policies and practices that foster a welcoming environment for all.
   

  

 We encourage candidates requiring accommodations to please let us know by emailing careers@flexera.com.

title: Senior Projektledare för Förändringsprojekt - Konsultuppdrag via REBE
description:
REBE söker en erfaren och handlingskraftig Projektledare för ett förändringsprojekt hos en av våra kunder i Stockholm. Uppdraget innebär att leda moderniseringen av ett IT-nätverk för att stödja kundens digitala transformationsbehov.
  
**Om Uppdraget:** Som projektledare kommer du att leda ett omfattande projekt för att skapa ett modernt, robust och säkert nätverk. Du kommer att ta fram en projektspecifikation inklusive budget, riskbedömning och tidtabell för projektet, samt ansvara för att driva projektet framåt enligt agila principer. **Arbetsuppgifter:**

Upprätta rutiner och processer för långsiktigt hållbara tjänster.

**Utbildning:** Högre utbildning inom IT och projektledning.
  
Erfarenhet av stora och komplexa Transition- och Transformationsprojekt inom IT-infrastruktur.
  
Tidigare ansvar för projekt inom nätverksområdet.
  
Kunskap i verktyg som Excel, PowerPoint och Project.
  
God kommunikationsförmåga på svenska, både skriftligt och muntligt.
  
Möjlighet att bli säkerhetsgodkänd.

Erfarenhet av att arbeta inom offentlig förvaltning.
  
Relevant certifiering inom projektledning.

description:

title: Senior Produktägare med analytisk förmåga - Konsultuppdrag via REBE
description:
REBE söker nu en erfaren och analytisk Produktägare för ett uppdrag hos en av våra kunder i Stockholm. Rollen är avgörande för att säkerställa att utvecklingsteamet levererar högsta möjliga värde genom att arbeta nära verksamheten och utvecklingsenheten.
  
**Om Uppdraget:** I rollen som Produktägare ansvarar du för att prioritera och hantera backloggen för att möta verksamhetens behov. Du kommer att arbeta dedikerat med masterdata och nära utvecklingsteamet, där majoriteten av teammedlemmarna sitter off-shore i Indien. Uppdraget kräver att du stödjer teamet i prioritering och bidrar med din analytiska förmåga för att förstå affärsbehoven och förvandla dem till konkreta utvecklingsuppgifter.
  
  

**Arbetsuppgifter:**

Samarbeta med olika intressenter och säkerställa god kommunikation och samverkan, särskilt i en mångkulturell miljö.
  
Bidra till kundens transformation mot lean-agila arbetssätt (SAFe).

Minst 3-5 års arbetslivserfarenhet som Produktägare, helst med erfarenhet av kravanalys.
  
Erfarenhet av att leda och coacha agila team och stödja dem i arbetet med att leverera värde till verksamheten.
  
Stark analytisk förmåga och erfarenhet av rotorsaksanalys.
  
Erfarenhet av agila utvecklingsmetoder, gärna SAFe.
  
Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.

**Plats:** Stockholm, med möjlighet till 25% distansarbete.

title: Global Digital Intelligence Manager
description:
***We are Oriflame***




*Founded in Sweden in 1967, we are a social selling beauty company present in over 60 countries around the world. We have a different and holistic view on beauty – Beauty by Sweden. For us, beauty is a way of life; to be healthy, enjoy beautiful skin, and to find your personal expression. Our portfolio of nature-inspired beauty products powered by science is marketed through more than 2 million Independent Oriflame Brand Partners.* 




  





  





 As one of our colleagues prepares for parental leave, we are seeking a skilled Digital Intelligence Manager to join our Digital Marketing department in our beautiful Stockholm office.
 



  





  





**About the Digital Marketing Department** 




 Our Digital Marketing department features some of the most inspiring and talented professionals in this field. We focus on optimizing Oriflame’s digital presence and performance across various channels, ensuring our strategies are data-driven and effective.
 



  





 If your dream is to think, create, and deliver impactful digital marketing strategies that will be the pride of the whole company and benefit its future growth, then our Digital Marketing team is the place for you.
 



  





**What will you do?** 




 You will track and analyze the performance of our digital channels, providing actionable insights to optimize our digital marketing efforts, including:
 



  





 Digital Performance Monitoring: Monitor and analyze digital performance for e-commerce platforms and other key pages, providing insights and recommendations for potential improvements.
 



  





 Social Media Analysis: Analyze social media content performance and offer strategic insights to enhance content quality and social media strategies.
 



  





 SEO Strategy: Oversee SEO strategies to boost organic traffic, improve keyword rankings, and increase overall search visibility.
 



  





 Performance Reporting: Generate and present performance reports, identifying trends, issues, and opportunities. Leverage data-driven insights to recommend improvements.
 



  





 A/B Testing: Develop and implement A/B testing strategies to enhance website performance and user experience. Run tests, analyze outcomes, and present insights to relevant stakeholders.
 



  





 Survey Analysis: Conduct and analyze surveys to gather insights into potential improvements across various digital channels.
 



  





**Critical for your success in this role:** 




  





 Consumer Focus: Capable of identifying clear and relevant consumer insights and building strong reasons to believe and launch.
 



  





 Business Understanding: Responsible for boosting business KPIs, challenging product forecasts, and influencing markets and NPD teams to increase sales and reduce costs. Need to have a holistic view of the business, understanding how product KPIs will positively influence overall brand/category KPIs.
 



  





 Creativity & Innovation: Knowledge of how to read trends and transform them into product opportunities. Keep an updated glance on innovation and new technologies.
 



  





 Entrepreneurship / Ownership: Feeling of brand ownership, leading the business as your own. Responsible for marketing activities and accountable for other areas.
 



  





 Strategic Thinking: Responsible for developing a medium- and long-term view of the brand/segment and its impact on the total category. Able to write official strategy documents and plan 5Y KPIs projections.
 



  





**Your background and your qualifications:** 



* Degree or master’s degree in Marketing, Digital Marketing, Business, or a related field.
* Background in digital marketing, performance marketing, or a related role.
* Understanding and experience working in digital marketing channels, including e-commerce, social media, email marketing, advertising, and SEO.
* High level of proficiency in digital tools such as Google Analytics, SEMrush, A/B testing platforms, social media platforms, survey platforms, Power BI, and other relevant tools.
* Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and translate it into actionable insights.
* Strong communication and presentation skills, with the ability to explain complex data and insights to non-technical stakeholders.
* Native or fluent skills in English



  





 We will be reviewing applications on a rolling basis. The position may be filled before the application deadline, so please submit your application as soon as possible.

title: License Owner, Stockholm
company_industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
**Passionate about football (soccer) AND about business? Stranger Soccer is expanding to key cities around the world. We are looking for a License Owner to open and operate the Stranger Soccer business in Stockholm.**
 This is not your traditional management job - it is truly built for someone that wants to own and operate their own business (that happens to make the world's greatest sport accessible to everyone). This role is ideally suited for an adventurous and football-passionate entrepreneur.
   

  

**Sounds Like You?**
 As a next step, please visit www.strangersoccer.com and particularly the section Bring Stranger Soccer to your City to learn more about this dynamic opportunity.
 **If it appears to be a fit, and you wish to learn more, please fill out the form there to officially express your interest.** 
 Be sure to download and explore the Stranger Soccer mobile app as well.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Bring the Stranger Soccer brand and business to life for the assigned city
* Recruit, train, and lead a small central team (2-3 persons) as well as a few freelance Official Hosts (game hosts) to kick off the operation
* Identify and secure prime slots at football venues to run Stranger Soccer games
* Engage in creative sales and marketing digital and hands-onto ensure that customers are introduced to the platform as a convenient and preferred way to play
* Oversee a schedule of games, ensuring customers are delighted with each game they play, and keep coming back for more
* Take advantage of the strong backing and direction of Singapore headquarters, where an operations and technology team is ready to support you.


**You should have**
* A passion for football, and a strong connection to your local football scene
* A business background, ideally in management and customer service
* An entrepreneurial background or spirit
* A commitment to owning, driving, and scaling the Stranger Soccer brand in the assigned market
* A hunger to succeed: financial compensation for this role will be proportionate to hard work, business acumen, and effectiveness.


**About Stranger Soccer**
 With 3.5 billion football enthusiasts in over 200 countries, football is the most popular sport in the world. But why dont more people play it? Stranger Soccer (www.strangersoccer.com) makes playing football as easy as going for a jog or to the gym. Browse dozens of games on its acclaimed Mobile App. Book a slot. Turn up and play.
   

  

 Incorporated in 2017, Stranger Soccer has quickly transformed the sports & recreation scene in Singapore. In a few short years, it has grown to be the #1-way people play football and futsal in the country, amassing tens of thousands of registered users purchasing thousands of slots every week. Whether you call it Fussball, Fútbol, Calcio, or anything else, the world now awaits.
   

  

**Our Mission**
 To make playing football as easy as going for a jog.
   

  

**Our Vision**
 A world in which playing football is as popular and widespread as watching football.
   

  

**Got what it takes?**
**We look forward to meeting you.**

title: Deployment Manager
description:
****POSITION SUMMARY****
 Exciting opportunity for a
 **Deployment Manager** 
 to join the team at AXA Partners. As Deployment Manager, you will be in charge of leading all aspects of the local business implementation processes for deal renewals and new business launches. This position will be at the forefront of ensuring seamless transitions from sales to operations, making a real impact on our business and our partners.
   

  

****What You'll Be Doing:****
* Leading the local business implementation processes for deal renewals and new business launches, collaborating with cross-functional experts to ensure successful deployment
* Presenting Operations/IT solutions and financial flows to partners, challenging and collaborating with them to develop optimum solutions and collect necessary data
* Driving implementation of new deals in close collaboration with Sales and Operations, ensuring successful deployment on time and in production without file manipulation
* Proactively driving change for the betterment of AXA Partners, partners, and customers


****Key Responsibilities:****
* Owning the implementation of new business, renewals, and financial conditions changes until the first successful production cycle and handover to Operations, including:
* Gathering deal information and designing Operating Models in collaboration with relevant functions
* Onboarding partners into the deployment process and ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements
* Implementing operational processes for successful launch and production, providing visibility of deployment to all functions
* Anticipating and preparing Deployment requirements to support business, including:
* Identifying and developing knowledge specific to the country on regulations, tax, legal entities, processes, and controls
* Building relationships with operational contacts and engaging with IT and other functions for future business support
* Monitoring KPIs, escalating issues, reporting new deals launched, and running retrospectives to identify areas of improvement


**Your Profile**
****About You:****
* Critical thinking, analytical skills, and attention to detail
* Proven background in project management, influencing, and negotiation skills
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in English and Swedish
* Strong experience in leading cross-functional business activities and project management
* Ability to work under pressure, manage tight deadlines
* Occasional travel within Europe will be required
* Minimum 5 years relevant experience
* Business School, Engineering or University Degree


****What We Offer:****
 A challenging role with the opportunity to make a significant impact within a global organization
   

  

**Competitive Compensation And Benefits Package**
 A supportive and inclusive work environment where your contributions are valued and recognized
   

  

 The chance to work with a diverse and talented team, promoting a culture of inclusivity and diversity
   

  

 If you're ready to take on this exciting challenge as a Deployment Manager with AXA Partners, apply now and be part of our journey in shaping the future of our organization!
   

  

****About AXA****
 AXA Group is the world leader in insurance and asset management. We protect and advise our clients at every step in their lives, by offering products and services which satisfy their needs in the areas of insurance, personal protection, saving and asset management. AXA is the leading insurance brand worldwide, with over 100 million clients. We are transforming from payer to partner for our client, with a strong focus on risk prevention.
   

  

 Our mission: Empower people to live a better life.
   

  

 Our values: Customer First, Courage, Integrity and One AXA.
   

  

****About The Entity****
 AXA Partners is an AXA transversal business unit offering a wide range of solutions in assistance services, travel insurance and credit protection.
   

  

 AXA Partners’ role is also to implement innovative solutions emerging from the AXA Innovation unit.
   

  

 Combining passion with advanced expertise, we design and deliver worldwide solutions for partners and communities. We protect what matters, when it matters.
   

  

****What We Offer****
 By joining AXA Partners, you will work in a responsible company, which offers a real culture of expertise & diversity. Our focus is on accelerating the development of everyone’s skills, whilst offering attractive and competitive compensation and opportunities for professional development and growth.
   

  

 Additionally, at AXA, we work to make a real difference to people - when amazing things happen and when we create opportunities for a better life, the feeling of pride is extraordinary.
   

  

**240008VS**

title: Deputy Secretary General/Deputy Director General – based in Luxembourg
description:
**This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence.** 
 The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support. The
 **EIB** 
 , the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Secretariat General at its headquarters in Luxembourg, a
 **Deputy Secretary General/Deputy Director General\*.** 
 This is a full-time temporary position at grade 8.
   

  

*The appointment is for a term of up to five years.*
*The successful candidate will be offered a definitive duration contract (CDD) of 5 years which may be renewed or converted in accordance with applicable policies and rules.*
* internal benchmark: Department Head


*Applicants will receive an initial feedback in September/October. Assessment Centres for selected applicants would take place from October.*
*Panel interviews are anticipated from November.*
 Purpose
   

  

 The newly created position will support the Secretary General in the leadership, management, coordination and supervision of the Secretariat General in the assigned areas of responsibility. The successful candidate will, under the authority of the Secretary General, have direct responsibility for all aspects of the Directorate’s departments relating to economic analysis and reporting, communications and corporate and institutional strategy. The role may evolve over time.
   

  

 You will provide leadership, strategic coordination and operational alignment to the departments within the remit of the position. You will be responsible for developing and implementing a plan and strategy for departments within own remit to assist the European Investment Bank to achieve its strategic priorities and realise efficiency gains, providing direction and setting priorities for their team.
   

  

 You will manage staff within own hierarchical structure in the delivery of this vision and strategy to achieve the objectives for the Secretariat General and to promote the efficient governance and institutional strategy of the Bank within own remit.
   

  

 Operating Network
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The Secretariat General is responsible for a wide range of activities and processes related to the core decision making and strategy definition within the Bank and related processes, including:
   

  

* Implementing and monitoring the decision-making processes in the Bank, and proposing, when relevant, changes in the governance policy;
* Defining corporate and institutional strategy at EU and national levels, and providing the background economic analysis to support it (including the Corporate Operational Plan);
* Providing economic analysis;
* Reporting on the EIBG’s corporate responsibility activities and managing relationships with NGOs;
* Promoting the EIB’s image, priorities and activities to the public through media relations, events and publications.
* Coordinating and developing relations with EU institutions, international and development financing agencies and NGOs. It is also responsible for the external relations towards all stakeholders and the civil society.


 The Secretariat General comprises three pillars, each headed by a Deputy Secretary General with their own clearly defined remit or a Director-General in respect of the EIB Permanent Representative’s Office in Brussels.
   

  

 One Pillar, The Stakeholder, Corporate And Governance Pillar, Focuses On Serving The Needs Of EIB’s Key Stakeholders - Shareholders, Governing And Control Bodies And Civil Society. This Pillar Comprises Three Departments
   

  

* the Shareholder Relations and Institutional Matters Department;
* the Regulation, Governance and Corporate Responsibilities; Department; and
* the EIB Institute.


 A Second Pillar, Which Will Be Led By The Successful Applicant, Is The Economics, Strategy And Communications Pillar And Which Comprises Three Departments
   

  

* the Group Strategy Department;
* the Communication Department; and
* the Economics Department.


 The Economics Department focuses on economic research, analysis and reporting. The Communication Department in responsible for the EIB’s internal and external communication management, including developing communication strategies for the digital and real-word presence of the EIB and providing translation services. The Group Strategy Department’s key responsibilities relate to developing the EIB Group Operational Plan and developing and coordinating the implementation of institutional and operational strategy and strategic initiatives across the EIB Group’s Services including the Group-wide coordination of efficiency projects.
   

  

 The successful candidate to head the Economics, Strategy and Communications Pillar will identify and nurture the synergies between the departments within the Pillar, giving the departments a clear and coherent direction for the areas within their remits and thereby reinforcing the efficaciousness of the EIBG in contributing to its mission and European priorities more generally.
   

  

 Accountabilities
   

  

* You will provide strategic and coherent direction to the teams within the Pillar to bolster the EIBG’s ability to achieve its strategic priorities and deliver the Bank and the European Union’s mission.
* You will contribute to defining the EIBG’s strategies for implementing its own goals and the European Union’s objectives and communicating those strategies and vision to the teams within the pillar. You will:


 Lead, motivate, develop and manage staff in own area of responsibility through the management team in place, ensuring that all staff has adequate competencies, training opportunities, technical resources and technical and personal skills to achieve their objectives.
   

  

 Ensure effective communication, cooperation and knowledge sharing between all members within own area of responsibility and the EIB services across the organisation.
   

  

 Ensure that the EIB’s strategic priorities are efficiently developed, elaborated, articulated and implemented in alignment with EIB Group policies and procedures.
   

  

 Ensure the efficient development and implementation of communication strategies in line with the communication strategies and priorities of the EIB Group.
   

  

 Develop an overall strategy for the different business areas within own area having regard to the overall strategy and priorities for the Secretariat General set down by the Secretary General and having regard to the governance and institutional strategy in the Bank in order to give clear direction to own teams and enable proper and efficient decision making.
   

  

 Establish and manage the resources and means to implement efficiently the EIB Group’s strategy throughout the directorate and the Bank.
   

  

 Design, maintain and follow-up, in close coordination with the Secretary General, the appropriate organisational structure within team, key performance indicators and ensure the realisation of qualitative and quantitative objectives.
   

  

 Ensure efficient and accountable use of resources in the realisation of own area’s mission.
   

  

 Ensure that staff resources are sized, organised and used adequately and efficiently to achieve business objectives and take ownership of the overall efficiency of the used resources.
   

  

 Organise, empower, manage and lead the decision-making in critical phases of key area processes in own area and throughout the Bank as a whole in order to deliver the results and objectives from the Secretariat General in compliance with EIB policies and governance.
   

  

 Delegate and empower the execution of key area processes to the appropriate managerial or executive level. Ensure the follow-up of the realised objectives and pro-actively adapt if needs be.
   

  

 Maintain constructive relationships with the different governing bodies (both managerial - Board of Governors, Board of Directors and Management Committee, as well as control functions – the Audit Committee) in relation to the responsibilities of own area to enable the Directorate to deliver its mission.
   

  

 Represent the Bank externally within the network of EU institutions and bodies, IFIs and other relevant external counterparts.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor), ideally in business administration, finance, economics, law, international relations or communications.
* Minimum 10 years of relevant experience in leading high-level positions of international multidisciplinary teams.
* At least 10 years of experience in managing and coaching staff, ideally in multicultural environments or international organisations (e.g. contribution to: determining team resources and skills; establishing objectives; assessing performance; delegating and supervising tasks; guiding, motivating, coaching and providing feedback).
* In depth knowledge of the functioning of EU institutions.
* Good knowledge of EIB objectives, business models and strategies.
* Solid understanding of finance and experience in banking institutions.
* Solid experience in economic analysis, in strategy definition through strategy projects and proven experience in setting and leading communication strategies.
* Strategic thinking and clarity of vision, sensitivity to business and political issues, analytical skills and sound judgement.
* Personal and professional credibility, with excellent communication skills.
* Empathy, excellent interpersonal, leadership, political and diplomatic skills; and ability to handle diverging interests, conflict and ambiguity. Resilience in business and people management issues.
* Creativity, openness to innovation and ability to support and manage change.
* Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (\*\*) with a good command of the other. (Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage).


 Competencies
   

  

*Find out more about EIB core and managerial competencies* 
 here
   

  

 To find out more about our eligibility criteria click here
   

  

*(\*\*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of* 
*level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.*
 We hire and value talent with unique characteristics, creating a work environment where they can be themselves. We believe that Diversity, Equity and Inclusion makes us a performing and innovative organisation. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

 We strongly invite applicants with a disability, neurodivergent profile or chronic condition to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.
   

  

 This is an open campaign to consecutively fill open positions. The campaign will remain open until position is filled. Applications will be reviewed in order of receipt.

title: Contributing Writer
description:
**IRIS Sustainable Development** 
 is a Non-Governmental Organisation based in Stockholm, Sweden, dedicated to promoting sustainability globally and implementing the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. The organization focuses on the interconnected aspects of sustainability (environmental, social, economic) to achieve the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). IRIS's work revolves around Sustainable Development Research, Monitoring, Advocacy, and Education.
 



  





**We are looking for new Contributing Writers!** 




 IRIS team seeks for motivated writers who will join our intecurlural team. If you are interested in environmental and social sustainability and want contribute by writing 1-2 articles per month (not fixed, it may vary) of 1000 - 1500 words, excluding references (in APA style), this position if for you.
 



  





**What you’ll get:** 




 – Strengthen your online publications portfolio on a reputable platform for a good cause
 



 – Give back by contributing your time and knowledge to a fact-based and impact-oriented
 



 – Work from home, and around other commitments
 



 – Learn and write about the environmental issues you care about the most
 



 – Sharpen your writing skills by receiving feedback from our experienced Advocacy Manager
 



 – Have your work distributed to a global audience via our website, social media platforms, and newsletters
 



 – Become a global reference point for online environmental news and analysis
 



 – Build a reputation as a reliable source of factual information
 



 – Bring the Science closer to our readers with a clear and engaging prose
 



  





**Key writing topics:** 




 -Policy & Economics
 



 -Technology
 



 -Pollution
 



 -Climate Change
 



 -Oceans, Biodiversity
 



 -Energy and Solutions
 



 -Women Entrepreneurship
 



 -Health, and Safety
 



 -Youth Empowerment
 



 -Geopolitics
 



  





**Sounds intersting?** 




 We are looking forward to your application.
 



 For any question please contact us: info@irissd.org

title: Business Analyst till vårt Intelligent Automation team!
description:
På Capgemini sätter vi alltid våra människor först – oavsett om det gäller våra partners, kunder eller anställda! Därför söker vi nu en Business Analyst som vill vara med och skapa mervärde för våra kunder och omvandla behov till friktionsfria, automatiserade processer. Tillsammans med kollegor som är experter i Intelligent Automation och kunder som har ambition att ta sig längre än till månen behöver vi dig och din analystiska förmåga för att organisera, strukturera och utmana vägen framåt.
   

  

**OM ROLLEN**
 Hos Capgemini kommer du arbeta med några av Sveriges största bolag, du kommer genomföra kravanalyser, kartlägga processer, hålla i workshops, utföra kostnadsnyttoanalys för automatiseringsinitiativ och formulera och definiera krav, allt för att kunna leverera bästa möjliga automatiseringar för kunden. Du är en del av våra kunders transformationsresa, samt Capgeminis globala ”Intelligent Automation Community”
   

  

 I rollen arbetar du nära ditt team bestående av kollegor inom Intelligent Automation, RPA utveckling, arkitektur, produktägare och självklart intressenter från businessen. Tillsammans levererar ni digitaliserade och automatiserade processer i världsklass till våra kunder. Du verkar i gränslandet mellan IT och verksamhet och trivs som bäst när du får djupdyka i problemlösning och skapa värde för kunden genom smarta processer och automatiseringar.
   

  

**DIN PROFIL**
* Gedigen erfarenhet av att ha arbetat som Business Analyst minst 4 år, och minst ett år i Intelligent Automation / RPA.
* Erfarenhet av att jobba med processer i olika nivåer från strategiska end-to-end processer till delprocesser.
* Erfarenhet av ett agilt arbetssätt.
* Har du även arbetat med process automatisering med RPA eller BPM, eller process analys med Process Mining, är detta meriterande.
* Intresse av verktygen inom Intelligent Automation såsom: Blue Prism, UiPath, Automation Anywhere, Celonis eller MS Power Automate.
* Högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande inom relevant område.
* God förståelse i svenska och engelska.


**VAD VI TROR KOMMER FÅ DIG ATT TRIVAS**
* Föräldraförmån
* Flexibla arbetsförhållanden & Work-from-Home Policy
* Tech communities
* Mentorskapsprogram (som mentor eller mentee)
* Delaktighet i Capgeminis olika fokusområden; Diversity and Inclusion, Sustainability, Wellness club, Art club etc.
* Generöst friskvårdsbidrag & tjänstepension
* Möjlighet till bonusprogram
* Kompetensutveckling i form av utbildningar och certifieringar
* Roliga och inspirerande personalevent
* Företagshälsovård & sjukvårdsförsäkring


**ANSÖKAN**
 Vi rekryterar löpande till denna roll, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Från att vi kontaktar dig tar processen cirka 2-3 veckor då vi i största möjliga mån arbetar agilt i rekryteringsprocessen, vilket innebär att flera steg kan ske parallellt.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**OM CAPGEMINI**
 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: FMC Manager (One year assignment)
description:
*Are you ready to shape the future of Tele2's fixed-mobile convergence strategy? Join our dynamic team and help drive one of the most impactful areas of our B2C business. This is your opportunity to create innovative solutions for our customers, working alongside industry experts in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.*
*This is a one-year temporary position covering parental leave, with the possibility of extension.*
**About The Job (B2C)**
 This role is with B2C (Business to Consumer), one of the key business units of the Tele2 corporation. B2C operates within several key areas concerning our two consumer brands, Tele2 and Comviq. This includes a wide range of activities spanning from digitalization, commercial strategies, marketing, sales, and customer service to TV content acquisition and advanced analytics. As we continuously strive to deliver superior solutions for our customers, we can guarantee that exciting projects will keep on coming.
   

  

 FMC (Fixed Mobile Convergence) is a key pillar in the Tele2’s growth and value strategy for the coming years. The goal is to win the full household on the Swedish market through fully fledged multi-product propositions and excellent customer experience. This role sits in the Business Management where main responsibilities are P&L management and business development, which means it’s at the very heart of the B2C business and where innovation is happening. The role reports to Head of Business Management who reports to Tele2 Commercial Director..
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Lead the business development of FMC concepts and propositions, which entails idea and concept development, market analysis, commercial design, support during product development and eventually go-to-market
* Design value propositions and product offerings to drive revenue growth through cross-sell and upsell
* Collaborate closely with product and IT teams to ensure commercial alignment with demand and development processes
* Provide commercial support on customer journeys, optimizing customer experiences and building strategies to drive FMC through increased product penetration into Swedish households
* Monitor market trends and competitor offerings to ensure Tele2’s FMC value proposition remains competitive


**Who are you?**
 To succeed in this role, we believe that you have:
   

  

* Strong business acumen and abilities to develop creative ideas into concepts and commercially viable propositions
* Ability to lead projects with stakeholders from all over the organization
* A sales mindset and eagerness to reach the next level
* Analytical skills and ability to build complex business cases
* Strong communication and presentation skills


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience from the telecom industry or another subscription-based business

title: Head of Sustainability Engagement at H&M Group Sustainability Department
Master Data Architect Consultant, Stockholm
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 Söker Du nästa utmaning och vill vara del av ett av ett växande team med vassa konsulter inom Master Data Management med bas i Stockholm?
   

  

 Just nu utökar vi ytterligare konsulter till vårt framgångsrika Data Management-team!
   

  

 Vi söker dig med erfarenhet av arkitekturfrågor inom Master Data Management. Då CGI är partner med Informatica är erfarenhet av Informaticas produkter ett plus men inte en nödvändighet.
   

  

 Förutom att bli en del av vårt vassa team erbjuder vi god möjlighet till att påverka och utforma din roll för att uppnå maximal utveckling. Vår bredd av experter skapar en optimal miljö för både team och individer att växa och utvecklas i.
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 På CGI strävar vi efter att skapa framgångsrika team som har roligt på jobbet och hjälper varandra att utvecklas. Vi anser att teamleveranser är viktiga och därför kommer du, tillsammans med dina kollegor, implementera och vidareutveckla MDM-lösningar hos våra kunder.
   

  

 I rollen som Master Data Architect Consultant har du en nyckelroll i våra uppdrag. Du gillar att jobba kundorienterat i en rådgivande roll mot våra kunder.
   

  

 Du kommer att trivas hos oss om du är en lagspelare med social förmåga. Du bör vara initiativtagande, lyhörd och trivas med ett högt tempo. Förmåga att kommunicera kring problem och lösningar är viktigt. Såklart är du noggrann i ditt arbete och strävar alltid efter att leverera med hög kvalitet.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 I rollen som Master Data Architect Consultant, söker vi dig som har:
   

  

* arbetat med att implementera och vidareutveckla MDM-lösningar
* minst 5 års erfarenhet av området (MDM/Information management/BI/Analytics)
* relevant högskoleutbildning
* goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska
* senior erfarenhet av att arbeta med arkitektur- och ETL-frågor


 Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Informatica (MDM, IDQ, EDC, PowerCenter)
* REST-API utveckling
* Har konsultbakgrund
* God erfarenhet inom business intelligence (företrädelsevis Microsofts BI-stack)


**Vad kan vi på CGI erbjuda dig?**
 CGIs kombination av global och lokal närvaro, med kontor på 30 orter i Sverige, ger nöjda kunder men innebär även att du som anställd alltid har ett kontor nära dig. Detta i kombination med flexibla arbetstider ger dig möjlighet till balans mellan privatliv och arbete, oavsett var i livet just du befinner dig.
   

  

 På CGI finns även stora möjligheter till interna karriärvägar där du kan välja att bli specialist inom ditt område, bredda dig inom nya områden eller ta en ledande befattning. Via våra interna nätverk, projekt och åtaganden i globala och nationella industrier, erbjuder vi dig kompetensutveckling och engagerade ledare som stöttar just dig i din utveckling.
   

  

 Gå gärna in på: https://www.cgi.com/se/sv/karriar/bi-analytics-stockholm för att se mer om vilka som jobbar på Analytics och lite om vad vi gör❤
   

  

**Vill du veta mer?**
 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig! Om det finns något du undrar över, skicka gärna dina funderingar till rekryterande ledare/Konsultchef Christian Carlborg, på christian.carlborg@cgi.com
   

  

**Mer information om våra förmåner:**
* Aktieprogram och delägarskap: Som delägare har du möjlighet att påverka och i vårt aktieprogram matchar CGI ditt bidrag, krona för krona upp till 3% av din månadslön.
* Friskvårdsbidrag: Vi erbjuder ett årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 4 000 kr.
* Föräldralön: Vi betalar upp till cirka 90% av din lön under den första tiden hemma.
* Trygg anställning: Våra konsulter anställs med kollektivavtal och försäkringar.
* Pensionslösningar: Vi erbjuder attraktiva och förmånliga pensionslösningar.
* Personalbil: Personalbilen används som en privatbil men leasas av CGI.


**CGI**
 CGI leder digitaliseringen av Sverige och är världsledande på att omvandla innovation, information och teknologi. Genom djup branschkunskap och en förståelse för kundens utmaningar, bidrar vi med insikter för att skapa hållbara resultat. Vi finns i 40 länder med 90 000 medarbetare. I Sverige är vi fler än 4000 anställda på 30 orter med huvudkontor i Stockholm. Läs mer om CGI på vår hemsida: www.cgi.se
   

  

**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Sales Executive
description:
**Working at Mercell**
 At Mercell, we're on a mission to revolutionize public procurement, making it accessible and effortless for everyone involved. Imagine a world where public buyers and visionary suppliers come together seamlessly to make a great deal easier and shape the future. That's what we're all about.
   

  

 With a dynamic culture built on continuous growth, trust, and collaboration, Mercell offers an environment where your talents can thrive. You will be part of an international environment with ambitious and dedicated colleagues who are passionate about what they do and supported to be themselves.
   

  

**Your Mission**
 As our new Sales Executive, you will be part of the Sales Organization, and report to the Head of Sales. You will play a pivotal role in our sales team, working towards capturing opportunities in the thriving and expansive Swedish market.
   

  

 Your primary responsibility will be to drive new sales and will have the opportunity to pitch one of the newest and most innovative solutions launched in Sweden during Q4 2024.
   

  

 We see the following qualities as important to thrive and evolve in this role:
   

  

* Adaptable and results-oriented.
* Able to work independently and collaboratively as part of a team.
* Self-directed and disciplined.
* A growth mindset.


**Core Responsibilities**
* Proactively prospect and engage with key decision-makers to drive business growth.
* Managing prospects and clients to build and nurture relationships.
* Manage the complete sales and upselling process, from initial contact to deal closure onboarding.
* Maintain accurate, up-to-date sales records and routinely update the CRM system.
* Stay informed about the Swedish public procurement market, using industry insights to fuel sales strategies and growth.


**Required Qualifications**
* (Ideally 2-3 years) experience in digital sales and high drive for results with documented results.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills.
* Fluent in Swedish language.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience from high-velocity sales.
* Knowledge of the public procurement market in Sweden is highly desirable.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team.
* Proficient time management and organizational skills.


**Start date:** 
 January 2025
   

  

**Duration:** 
 Full time
   

  

**Workplace type:** 
 Hybrid remote
   

  

**Location:** 
 Sweden, Stockholm
   

  

**Application Deadline: 30** 
**.11.2024 .** 
 However, do not wait to submit your application - we will read applications and talk to potential candidates as we receive them.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 As a fast growing technology company, we are committed to taking care of our employees through initiatives such as hybrid work to support work-life balance, health and insurance plans (may differ per country/office), pension plans, paid parental leave, social happenings and competitive salary packages. Please see https://career.mercell.com/posts/our-perks-benefits to get more insights on what to expect of perks, benefits and culture when joining Mercell.
   

  

**Has this sparked your interest?**
 If you have questions for this position, we are happy to chat with you. Please reach out to:
   

  

 Kenan Galijatovic
   

  

 Head of Sales
   

  

**Email:** 
 kenan.galijatovic@mercell.com
   

  

*We may carry out background checks on applicants to verify information that appears on CVs and other documentation. This background check is carried out by an external party and is not carried out without the consent of the applicant. Current applicants will receive further information about this.*
**For more information or questions please contact us at** 
 kenan.galijatovic@mercell.com

title: Account Executive for an innovative FinTech company
Business Development Manager/Account Manager till ECIT NORIAN AB
description:
Är du en driven och relationsskapande person som vill vara med och hjälpa företag att effektivisera sina affärsprocesser genom digitala lösningar? ECIT NORIAN söker nu en driven medarbetare som vill bli en del av deras team och bidra till att förenkla ekonomiadministration!
 



  

**Företag :**
 ECIT NORIAN AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm, Sundbyberg
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Försäljning
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 ECIT NORIAN fortsätter att växa och söker nu en ambitiös och resultatorienterad Business Development Manager/Account Manager med fokus på nykundsbearbetning.
 


  


 Vi söker dig som verkligen vill utvecklas inom försäljning. Hos ECIT NORIAN är det viktigt att du är en prestigelös lagspelare som samskapar med både kunder och kollegorna på jobbet. För att lyckas i rollen behöver du ha egenskaper som driv, målfokus och nyfikenhet. Om du har viljan att utvecklas kommer ECIT NORIAN att ge dig kunskaper och förutsättningar att lyckas, ett steg i taget!
 


  


 De är ett team på 10 personer med stark sammanhållning, fyllda av glädje, energi och driv. Hos ECIT NORIAN är det högt i tak – de uppmuntrar öppenhet, ärlighet och att våga säga vad man tycker. De är stolta över sitt arbete och deras gemensamma arbetsplats, och tillsammans skapar de en positiv och inspirerande miljö!
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En spännande och dynamisk arbetsplats med stora möjligheter att påverka och växa
  
* Möjlighet att arbeta med innovativa digitala lösningar som hjälper företag att automatisera och effektivisera sin administration
  
* Stöd från ett erfaret och familjärt team med en stark koncern i ryggen
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**

 Som Business Development Manager/Account Manager hos ECIT NORIAN kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i bolagets fortsatta expansion genom att aktivt identifiera och bearbeta nya kunder. Du ansvarar för att presentera outsourcing-lösningar inom redovisning, löneadministration och affärsstöd till företag som vill effektivisera och digitalisera sina ekonomifunktioner.
 


  


 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter kommer att vara:
 


  

  
* Driva nykundsbearbetning och skapa nya affärsmöjligheter
  
* Bygga långsiktiga relationer med beslutsfattare inom olika branscher
  
* Presentera och sälja ECIT NORIAN's outsourcing- och digitala lösningar
  
* Arbeta nära andra avdelningar för att säkerställa smidiga övergångar och hög kundnöjdhet
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har erfarenhet av B2B-försäljning, gärna inom ekonomi eller IT-tjänster
  
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, i både tal och skrift, då det krävs i den dagliga kommunikationen. Eftersom att ECIT NORIAN är en del av en global koncern behöver du även vara bekväm i att tala och skriva på engelska
  
* Är målfokuserad, självgående och har ett starkt driv för att skapa tillväxt och affärer
  
* Har förmåga att bygga förtroende och skapa starka relationer
  
* Är van att arbeta med försäljningsprocesser från första kontakt till avslut
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**ECIT NORIAN AB**

 ECIT NORIAN är ett företag som erbjuder tjänster inom redovisning, löneadministration och affärsstöd, både i form av outsourcing och digitala lösningar. De hjälper företag att hantera ekonomifunktioner som bokföring, skattefrågor, rapportering, löner och lönesystem, och är en del av ECIT Group, ett större norskt IT- och ekonomikonsultföretag. ECIT NORIAN fokuserar på att effektivisera och digitalisera affärsprocesser för sina kunder, ofta genom att använda teknik som automatisering och digitala plattformar för att förenkla administration och reducera manuella processer.
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till ECIT NORIAN AB**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Milly Ellqvist Weidstam eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv3@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107589

title: Chefsjurist till Strukton Rail AB
company_industry: Railroad Equipment Manufacturing, Construction, and Real Estate
description:
**Chefsjurist till Strukton Rail AB** 




  





 Strukton Rail AB är Sveriges största privata järnvägsentreprenör och är verksamma i Sverige och i våra skandinaviska grannländer. Vi bygger ny järnväg och underhåller den vi redan har. Tillsammans med våra tusen medarbetare levererar vi hållbara och kostnadseffektiva lösningar av hög kvalité. Här får du chans att tillsammans med våra kunniga och engagerade kollegor fortsätta utveckla långsiktiga lönsamma affärer och samtidigt bidra till miljön och infrastrukturen i Sverige. Rollen avser tillsvidareanställning i ett stabilt bolag i en spännande bransch, där du ges möjligheten att påverka och utveckla vårt arbete framåt.
 



*Tillsammans utvecklar vi en hållbar järnväg för ett hållbart samhälle!* 




  





**Vi erbjuder** 




 Hos Gustav Oscarsson, VD, blir du delaktig i ett gäng med många yrkeskunniga kollegor som drivs av att arbeta med affärer, personal och teknik! Vår främsta tillgång är du. Vi tror på din förmåga, hjälper och lär av varandra – och vi har roligt när vi gör det. Med olika bakgrund och olika förutsättningar bidrar alla med unik kompetens och nya infallsvinklar. Värdegrunden RÄLS: Respekt, Ärlighet, Lita på, Säkerhet genomsyrar allt vi gör. Vi erbjuder dig spännande arbetsuppgifter och stor flexibilitet – för vi vet att livet utanför jobbet också måste gå ihop. I vår förmånsportal får du tillgång till rabatter på produkter och tjänster, friskvårdsbidrag och pensionsrådgivning.
 



  





**Jobböversikt** 




 Vi söker en chefsjurist med auktoritet och omfattande erfarenhet av att bygga och utveckla en affärsdriven och värdeskapande juridisk funktion. Den kandidat vi söker bör ha förtroende från ledning, styrelse och andra intressenter, samt en god erfarenhet av entreprenadjuridik.
 



 I rollen som chefsjurist kommer du att fungera som företagets huvudjuridiska rådgivare, ge juridisk vägledning och säkerställa strategisk och effektiv hantering av affärsrisker. Denna roll omfattar hantering av alla juridiska frågor, inklusive bolagsärenden, företagskommers och bolagsstyrning. Chefsjuristen kommer att rapportera till företagets vd och baseras på huvudkontoret i Stockholm.
 



  





**Ansvarsområden** 



* Granska, tolka och förhandla Struktons kommersiella avtal
* Stödja och utbilda anställda i verksamheten, exempelvis inom entreprenadrätt, avtalsrätt eller avtalsförvaltning (i samarbete med funktionen för avtalsförvaltning)
* Ge rådgivning inom alla juridiska områden som är relevanta för vår verksamhet, t.ex. entreprenadrätt, allmän avtals- och köprätt, offentlig upphandling, konkurrensrätt, aktiebolagsrätt, IT och GDPR
* Ansvara för företagets uppförandekod och visselblåsarfunktion
* Delta i anbudsarbeten där anbud lämnas till privata och offentliga kunder
* Koordinera företagets sakförsäkringar (med stöd av koncernens befintliga försäkringsmäklare)
* Tillhanda rollen som riskansvarig
* Samarbeta med koncernens General Counsel och andra interna jurister inom koncernen
* Arbeta nära verksamheten som expert och beslutsstöd i olika projekt
* Bidra till utvecklingen och anpassningen av den juridiska funktionen efter verksamhetens behov



  





**Vem söker vi?** 




 Du bör ha en svensk jur.kand.-examen och minst sju (7) års relevant erfarenhet från advokatbyrå och/eller bolag.
 



  





**Övriga kvalifikationer:** 



* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med entreprenadjuridik hantering av kommersiella kontrakt och bolagsstyrning.
* Utmärkta analytiska, förhandlings- och kommunikationsfärdigheter.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta inom byggsektorn
* Starkt affärssinne och förståelse för affärsverksamhet.
* Flytande i svenska och engelska.
* För anställning krävs även godkänd säkerhetsprövning.



 En ledare på Strukton Rail är modig, engagerad, kommunikativ och agerar som en förebild! Du är en lösningsorienterad, kreativ, ochödmjuk ledare som är en facilitator och möjliggörare. Vi ser att du har god förmåga att planera och strukturera ditt arbete, samt följa upp och justera uppsatta mål. Du har en hög standard på kvaliteten på ditt arbete, med fokus på kostnader, intäkter, vinst och marknaden. Du präglas av affärsmässiga principer! Vi söker med andra ord en pålitlig, affärsinriktad ”doer”.
 



  





**För mer information** 




 I detta rekryteringsuppdrag samarbetar Strukton Rail AB med Sharp Recruitment & Consultants. För mer information, vänligen kontakta Ron Cohen på +46 735 185 188 eller via e-post till ron.cohen@sharprecruitment.se
 



 Observera att vi intervjuar kandidater löpande. Tveka inte att kontakta oss för mer information.
 



  





 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Information System Engineer
description:
**Company Description**
 At Intuitive, we are united behind our mission: we believe that minimally invasive care is life-enhancing care. Through ingenuity and intelligent technology, we expand the potential of physicians to heal without constraints.
   

  

 As a pioneer and market leader in robotic-assisted surgery, we strive to foster an inclusive and diverse team, committed to making a difference. For more than 25 years, we have worked with hospitals and care teams around the world to help solve some of healthcare's hardest challenges and advance what is possible.
   

  

 Intuitive has been built by the efforts of great people from diverse backgrounds. We believe great ideas can come from anywhere. We strive to foster an inclusive culture built around diversity of thought and mutual respect. We lead with inclusion and empower our team members to do their best work as their most authentic selves.
   

  

 Passionate people who want to make a difference drive our culture. Our team members are grounded in integrity, have a strong capacity to learn, the energy to get things done, and bring diverse, real world experiences to help us think in new ways. We actively invest in our team members to support their long-term growth so they can continue to advance our mission and achieve their highest potential.
   

  

 Join a team committed to taking big leaps forward for a global community of healthcare professionals and their patients. Together, let's advance the world of minimally invasive care.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Primary Function of Position:
   

  

 Our digital solutions provide technology to enable easier capturing, archiving, live streaming and sharing of clinical video and other data around diagnostic and therapeutic procedures, while also allowing for a complete integration with electronic medical records (EMR) and picture archival and communications (PACS) systems.
   

  

 We are seeking a highly motivated technical expert to install and support our digital products and to ensure service agreements and warranty obligations are fulfilled to the highest satisfaction. This person shall thrive to exceed customer expectations and maintain customer satisfaction at the highest possible level. The position will be located in the Nordics (remote setup), with a focus on Nordic countries, but will also serve any other markets as per current needs.
   

  

**Roles And Responsibilities**
* Performs remote server installation as well as server, network and services configurations
* Performs physical system installations, when needed (exceptional)
* Installs system upgrades
* Provides technical support to customers and other Intuitive employees.
* Performs maintenance inspections as required to ensure system meets performance specifications
* Troubleshoots and repairs Intuitive products and associated equipment failures
* Maintains accurate configurations of installed base
* Supports tradeshow activity
* Maintains up-to-date documentation, which include but not limited to; Field Activity Reports, Return Material Authorizations, etc.
* Provides excellent customer support by timely addressing reported issues
* Provides feedback to improve processes and efficiencies
* Is the advanced technical go-to person with regards to Intuitive’s digital solutions
* Creates and validates architectural, technical, and functional design of the system


**Qualifications**
 Required Knowledge, Skills and Experience
   

  

**Minimum**
* 7-10 years of field service experience with medical systems preferred.
* Proven track record of troubleshooting medical software systems.
* Good written and oral communication skills – English and Danish or Swedish.
* Windows Operating System and server system administrator.
* Professional installation and wiring of PC hardware in multiple configurations (wall, boom, mobile cart).
* Proven administrative and record keeping skills.
* Strong analysis, troubleshooting and debugging skills.
* Ability to work independent and purposeful from remote.
* Effective self-management with moderate supervision


**Preferred**
- Hardware and Software installation and configuration.

- Healthcare and Medical system installation.

- LDAP configuration and troubleshooting.

- SQL system administrator and troubleshooting.

 Good knowledge of core IT technologies (e.g., network systems, operating systems, databases, access controls, IT operations, etc.).Travel
   

  

**Additional Notes And Physical Requirements**
* Ability to work from remote.
* Able to enter surgical and other patient care areas.
* Ability to travel up to 25%. Some short notice travel required.
* Able to lift 50 lbs.


 Additional Information
   

  

 Intuitive is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. We provide equal employment opportunities to all qualified applicants and employees, and prohibit discrimination and harassment of any type, without regard to race, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, color, age, religion, protected veteran or disability status, genetic information or any other status protected under federal, state, or local applicable laws.
   

  

 We will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records in accordance with fair chance laws.
   

  

**Shift:** 
 Day
   

  

**Travel:** 
 25% of the time

title: Test Coordinator to Siemens Mobility
description:
**Testkoordinator till Siemens Mobility**
*På Siemens arbetar vi mot visionen om en hållbar värld som vi stolt kan lämna över till nästa generation. Vi gör det genom att utveckla teknik inriktad mot att lösa framtidens globala utmaningar. För oss är detta mer än ett jobb, det är vår delade passion och drivkraft.*
*Vill du också vara en del av vår resa och vara med och bidra till en hållbar värld?*
**Om rollen**
 Som Testkoordinator för Siemens Mobility kommer du att stödja införandet av ny programvara för planerings- och Trafikledningssystem. I denna roll kommer du att utveckla professionella testplaner för faserna innan och efter release, inom både interna och kundens miljö. Genom att samarbeta med kunder och kollegor, kommer du att skapa praktiska testsituationer och analysera resultaten därefter. Dessutom kommer du att verka i en internationell miljö, fungera som en nyckelperson för automatisering av testsituationer och manuella tester.
   

  

**För att lyckas i denna position behöver du ha:**
* djup förståelse för struktur och funktion av programvara.
* haft initial erfarenhet av att skapa testplaner och skriva testfall, eller ha motivation att lära dig dessa färdigheter.
* kvalifikation eller ha genomfört utbildning som IT-specialist, ha en examen i datavetenskap eller ett relaterat område med fokus på informationsteknologi och/eller järnvägsindustri
* starka kommunikationsfärdigheter och uppskatta att se bortom de omedelbara uppgifterna.
* Professionell kunskap (flytande) i både tal och skrift i svenska
* Professionell kunskap i engelska.


**Vad vi erbjuder**
* Inkluderande kultur där du välkomnas att vara dig själv.
* Vi uppmuntrar nya perspektiv och modet att tänka annorlunda och bryta ny mark.
* Flexibla arbetsformer för att uppmuntra en balans mellan arbete och privatliv.
* Globala karriärmöjligheter.


 Vill du skapa en bättre morgondag tillsammans med oss? Ansök redan idag, vi intervjuar löpande. Vi ser fram emot att ta emot din ansökan. För frågor om rollen, kontakta Annica Gustafsson, Rekryterande chef på annica.gustafsson@siemens.com och för frågor om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta stefan.kristoffersson.ext@siemens.com.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Siemens Mobility har varit en ledare inom transportlösningar i mer än 160 år. Som en ledare inom transportlösningar formar vi uppkopplad mobilitet. Läs mer om Siemens Mobility: Hem - Siemens Mobility Sweden.
   

  

 Siemens är ett fokuserat teknikföretag som banar väg för intelligenta lösningar som omvandlar vardagen inom tillverkning, nätverk, byggnader och transport. Vår teknologi adresserar verkliga problem som påverkar mänsklighetens framtid: klimatförändringar, säker kraft, urbanisering och en åldrande befolkning. Med samlade krafter från mer än 300,000 personer och närvaro i över 190 länder, gör vi en verkligt global inverkan. Tillsammans med våra kunder och som en del av ett bredare ekosystem, skapar vi djärva och meningsfulla innovationer som förändrar sättet vi alla lever, arbetar, skapar och rör oss på.

title: Software Lead
description:
**About the role** 

  





 We’re on the hunt for a talented 
 **Software Developer** 
  who shares our passion for empowering businesses and can turn visionary ideas into practical solutions. You’ll be heavily involved in building our platform from scratch, working closely with our founder to bring idele’s mission to life.
 



  





 This isn’t just a job—it’s an opportunity to make a real impact, grow with us, and potentially step into a CTO role as we evolve. We’re looking for someone who’s eager to learn, values collaboration, and wants to be part of changing the face of marketing, one business at a time.
 



  





 Read more about the role on our website: https://idele.com/careers/software-lead/
 



  




**What you'll do** 

  




* **Platform development:** 
  Design and develop our software platform from the ground up, focusing on simplicity, scalability, and user-friendliness.
* **Vision implementation:** 
  Translate the founder’s innovative ideas into practical, actionable solutions that empower our users.
* **LLM integration:** 
  Utilize Large Language Models (LLMs) to scrape information from websites and generate new data through inference, enhancing our platform’s capabilities.
* **Cloud infrastructure:** 
  Set up and manage cloud hosting services (preferably Google Cloud Platform) to optimize integration with AI services.
* **Collaboration:** 
  Work closely with the founder and marketing lead to align technical development with our mission and vision.
* **Culture contribution:** 
  Help foster an inclusive, transparent, and down-to-earth company culture where everyone’s ideas are valued.



  




**Preferably you are...** 
* **Inclusive:** 
  You believe great ideas come from anywhere and value diverse perspectives without pandering.
* **Confident yet humble:** 
  Sure of your skills but always open to learning and feedback—confident without being boastful.
* **Pragmatic innovator:** 
  You favor simplicity and smart solutions over unnecessary complexity—innovative but never complex.
* **Approachable and transparent:** 
  A strong communicator who values honesty and openness—straightforward but never cold.
* **Team player:** 
  You thrive in collaborative environments and contribute positively to team culture.
* **Eager to grow:** 
  Excited about personal and professional development alongside the company’s growth.
* **Accountable:** 
  You take ownership of your work and are responsible for your contributions.



  




**Preferably you have...** 
* **Proficiency in programming Languages:** 
  Such as Python or JavaScript.
* **Experience with web frameworks:** 
  Familiarity with Django, Flask, React, or similar technologies.
* **Knowledge of databases:** 
  Understanding of both relational and NoSQL databases.
* **Understanding of machine learning concepts:** 
  Experience with integrating machine learning models is a plus.
* **Cloud platform experience:** 
  Knowledge of cloud services, especially Google Cloud Platform.
* **Web scraping skills:** 
  Familiarity with web scraping tools and methodologies.
* **Problem-solving abilities:** 
  Excellent analytical skills and attention to detail.



  




**What's in it for you?** 

  





**Leadership pathway:** 




 You'll have the opportunity to grow your skills and responsibilities as our company scales, ultimately stepping into the role of CTO.
 



  





**Make an impact:** 




 By contributing your skills and vision, you will lay down the essential foundational stones that define our company's future.
 



  





**Inviting culture:** 




 Excel in an agile and flexible work environment that wants you to explore new ideas that has the potential to directly have an impact on the company's direction and success.
 



  





**Competitive incentives:** 




 We value your dedication and creativity, offering a suite of benefits tailored to nurture your professional growth and the unique opportunity to be part of our journey from the beginning.
 



  





**Design your work life:** 




 We value flexibility and balance. Shape your working style around your life, in an environment that supports your well-being and productivity.
 



  




**About idele** 

  





 At 
 **idele** 
 , we believe that every business deserves a fair shot at success. In a world dominated by complex marketing tools and steep learning curves, small and medium-sized businesses often struggle to reach their audiences. We’re here to change that.
 



  





 Our mission is to democratize marketing by empowering every business—regardless of size or resources—with the tools to deliver personalized experiences, relevant information, and inspirational messaging at each stage of the customer journey. We aim to transform audiences into loyal customers with ease.
 



  





 We’re passionate about making marketing accessible, practical, and straightforward. We’re not about gimmicks or fluff—just functional tools designed to empower businesses. We’re a small, collaborative team that values innovation, teamwork, and accountability. We take our work seriously, but not ourselves.
 



  





**Function:** 
 Software Development
 



**Location:** 
 Alviks strand, Stockholm
 



**Employment type:** 
 Full-time
 



**Start date:** 
 As soon as possible
 



**Application deadline:** 
 2 December
 



  






 Read more about the role on our website:
 

 https://idele.com/careers/software-lead/

title: Specialist Customer Success Partner (S-CSP) - SAP Academy for Customer Success- Sweden (Hybrid)
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**We help the world run better**
 At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.
   

  

**The SAP Academy for Customer Success is a talent development program specifically for candidates early in their careers.**
**Who You’ll Become**
 The Specialist Customer Success Partner (S-CSP) works directly with customers to guide them through their business journey with our solutions. The S-CSP works to increase customer satisfaction, retention, renewals, references and upsells for Cloud products within their assigned solution portfolio. The S-CSP oversees key customer milestones throughout the customer lifecycle, from deal signature through system provisioning, monitoring implementation progress, and business case achievement. The S-CSP is expected to serve as the strategic point of contact for the customer within the assigned solution portfolio and to leverage appropriate resources across SAP functions to maintain overall customer health.
   

  

 As a S-CSP within the SAP Academy for Customer Success, you will be responsible to:
   

  

* Successfully complete a 10-month learn-apply program, which includes classroom phases and field phases with your CSP team, that enhances your support into the S-CSM/E-CSM role, a critical customer facing function within our dynamic Customer Success board area.
